title: Can skin shards be activated on rented champs?
body:
So lets just say i had a zed champion shard (which i don't - but that doesn't matter, it's just a hypothetical situation)
and lets say i got a project zed for the event thing (which i also didn't)

So i (or rather, the me in the hypothetical situation) lacked the blue shards to activate the zed champion shard
if i hit the 7 day rent button on him, would i be able to activate the project zed skin to get the border? 
then buy zed when i have the ip?


i found this funny post while searching 
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/Uji5fqUt-hextech-renting-a-skinchampion

replies.body:
No

Also you cant get project zed border anymore.

The first strike borders for fiora zed lucian yi and leona were acquired by buying them in the first few weeks since they were released.

The only reason yasuo is getting a border is because he never had one in the first place and all the other project skins do.

Source: I own first strike project lucian.

good point. i'll go disenchant them since i don't play zed anyway
